paper_abstract: Information Systems Research ("Wirtschaftsinformatik") basically follows two research approaches: the behavioristic approach and the design-oriented approach. In this memorandum, 10 authors propose principles of design-oriented information systems research. Moreover, the memorandum is supported by 111 full professors from the German-speaking scientific community, who with their signature advocate the principles specified therein. European Journal of Information Systems (2011) 20, 7-10, doi:10.1057/ejis.2010.55; published online 7 December 2010
paper_title: Memorandum on design-oriented information systems research
